description: Modifies the orginal Settings class provided by the user

max_retries.description: Number of times to retry failed API calls.
max_retries.title: Max Retries

max_wait_time.description: Maximal time in seconds to wait before quitting without a download.
max_wait_time.title: Max Wait Time

part_size.description: The part size to use for download.
part_size.title: Part Size

wkvs_api_url.description: URL to the root of the WKVS API. Should start with https://
wkvs_api_url.title: Wkvs Api Url

title: ModSettings
